name: Disco Ninja Turbo Battle
description:
I'm Gabriel Parrott, and Disco Ninja Turbo Battle is a rhythm game that tries to do something a little different than most rhythm games. This isn't DDR or Guitar Hero. What is it? Find out!

I made this game as a final project for the course, Computational Media 80K at University of California, Santa Cruz. This is an alpha or beta maybe.

The character art and animation, as well as the heads that spin around were made by Julian "Jude" Loren, an Art & Game Design student at University of California, Santa Cruz.

The music was made by Jay Man @ OurMusicBox.com, and the tracks are as follows

"Serial Killer" by Jay Man OurMusicBox.com

"Unauthorized Units" by Jay Man OurMusicBox.com

"World Gang" by Jay Man OurMusicBox.com

A gameplay video can be found here: https://youtu.be/m8pIW-hErBs

The source is made available on GitHub here: https://github.com/amixtum/disco-ninja-turbo-battle

Note: The Linux version is not the latest build. I am working on it.
